name: 30 Seconds To Jail
description:
30 seconds to jail is an indie game about a dude, who gets a bag of drugs. You have 30 seconds to figure out how to get rid of them and not get caught in jail. From banal feeding to the dog, to the full rituals of calling the spirit of Bob Marley.

FEATURES
  • 20 unexpected endings
  • Pleasant pixel art
  • Atmospheric soundtrack
  • Achievements
